# Unlock Gross to Net Excellence
Process payments, categorize deductions, forecast sales, and track trade spend in a single platform
[Book a demo](https://www.confidotech.com/</talk-to-an-expert>)
Trusted by leading CPG companies
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d494aa6bd2182ce913237b/660d9fdeb1da0ada623fbbf8_2020-SM_Wordmark_brown_1%20\(5\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d494aa6bd2182ce913237b/64da06d862786b295d8f9912_Feastables%20-%20Logo.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d494aa6bd2182ce913237b/64da06f2bc219a0c49e2937a_Chomps%20-%20Logo.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d494aa6bd2182ce913237b/660d715a967f9d14bb4f98d2_squatch-removebg-preview.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d494aa6bd2182ce913237b/66b4c72b1b2505e59240f275_dude-wipes-logo.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d494aa6bd2182ce913237b/66b4cfa7ff59e29c9365f667_file__4_-removebg-preview.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d494aa6bd2182ce913237b/64da06e75ffe295130136f25_Mush%20-%20Logo.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d494aa6bd2182ce913237b/64da106e2e307274f25f80f7_From%20the%20ground%20up%20-%20Logo.svg)

IMPROVE YOUR WORKFLOW, SAVE TIME
## Cash application
Streamline your workflow with automated document aggregation, information extraction and entry to accounting systems
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d494aa6bd2182ce9132374/64d494aa6bd2182ce91323b6_Group%201000002126.webp)
### Data aggregation
Automatically extract remittances and deductions from over 40 vendor emails and portals.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d494aa6bd2182ce9132374/64d494aa6bd2182ce91323b6_Group%201000002126.webp)
### Classification and extraction
Automated deduction classification and extraction of key information like reason for deduction, product line, execution periods, etc.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d494aa6bd2182ce9132374/64d494aa6bd2182ce91323b6_Group%201000002126.webp)
### Real time sync with accounting systems
Sync entries in one click with granular detail with native support for custom fields.
[Learn more](https://www.confidotech.com/</talk-to-an-expert>)
![bill confido](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d494aa6bd2182ce9132374/64d494aa6bd2182ce91323b5_Bill%20Mockup.svg)
![payment ui screen for confido](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d494aa6bd2182ce9132374/64e8701ca9432f9989336913_02-min.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d494aa6bd2182ce9132374/64db25d32868255d11b7a944_Group%201000002087.svg)
![ui screen](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d494aa6bd2182ce9132374/64e86e1dfff8277f78a885df_01-min.svg)
ENHANCE VISIBILITY, DRIVE ACCOUNTABILITY
## Deduction Management
Recover invalid dollars, drive accountability and understand trends 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d494aa6bd2182ce9132374/64d494aa6bd2182ce91323b6_Group%201000002126.webp)
### Disputes
Contest invalid claims in a few clicks
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d494aa6bd2182ce9132374/64d494aa6bd2182ce91323b6_Group%201000002126.webp)
### Approvals
Seamlessly route deductions to the right person across departments
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d494aa6bd2182ce9132374/64d494aa6bd2182ce91323b6_Group%201000002126.webp)
### Reporting
Single pane of glass to track trends across dozens of retailers and distributors
[Learn more](https://www.confidotech.com/</talk-to-an-expert>)
Create Promotion events in seconds
## Trade Promotion Management
Manage your entire gross-to-net forecast, analysis, and accruals in a central application 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d494aa6bd2182ce9132374/64d494aa6bd2182ce91323b6_Group%201000002126.webp)
### Promotion planner
Create promotional events in a few clicks with approval workflows
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d494aa6bd2182ce9132374/64d494aa6bd2182ce91323b6_Group%201000002126.webp)
### Accrual reporting
Compare actual vs. planned trade spend. Manage trade accruals with the ability to drill into the underlying deductions and data
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d494aa6bd2182ce9132374/64d494aa6bd2182ce91323b6_Group%201000002126.webp)
### Net Sales Reporting
Analyze net sales and trade rate for indirect retailers, director customers, product lines, custom attributes, and more.
[Learn more](https://www.confidotech.com/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d494aa6bd2182ce9132374/669677e35abdb82d9bc35e70_Screenshot%202024-07-16%20at%209.36.59%20AM%201.png)![Promotion analytics](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d494aa6bd2182ce9132374/66954decb7399f5b30ca4793_Screenshot%202024-04-23%20at%2010.13.49%20AM.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d494aa6bd2182ce9132374/64db25d32868255d11b7a944_Group%201000002087.svg)
![ui screen](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d494aa6bd2182ce9132374/64e86e1dfff8277f78a885df_01-min.svg)
![Sales forecasting](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d494aa6bd2182ce9132374/669690819f7dcadfb5fde3db_Screenshot%202024-07-16%20at%209.58.22%20AM%201%20\(1\).png)![Sales analysis](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d494aa6bd2182ce9132374/66968ffdf90c23bfb9b65462_Group%20237295.png)
Accurate planning across the organization
## Sales Forecasting
Seamlessly integrated sales and trade forecasting based on customizable inputs
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d494aa6bd2182ce9132374/64d494aa6bd2182ce91323b6_Group%201000002126.webp)
### Integrated shipment and consumption forecasting
Linked consumption and shipment forecastingto bring together sales and operations 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d494aa6bd2182ce9132374/64d494aa6bd2182ce91323b6_Group%201000002126.webp)
### Re-forecasting
Manage re-forecast processes with approval controls
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d494aa6bd2182ce9132374/64d494aa6bd2182ce91323b6_Group%201000002126.webp)
### Audit Logs
View historical changes across the organization for version control and accountability
[Learn more](https://www.confidotech.com/</talk-to-an-expert>)
WHO IS CONFIDO FOR
## Empower your entire team with Confido
### CFOs
Visibility you need to drive decisions and drive organization-wide accountability into deductions.
### Controllers
High quality auditable accounting in less time.
### Accountants
Reprioritize time from repetitive manual tasks to strategic tasks.
### Sales people
Seamlessly update promotion plans and track performance against plan.
### Ops people
Quickly understand operational deductions, recover invalid dollars, and drive operational improvement.
## Seamlessly connect your most important data sources

### Confido: Revolutionizing Financial Automation for CPG Brands

**Overview:**  
Confido is a cutting-edge financial automation and intelligence platform designed specifically for fast-growing Consumer Packaged Goods (CPG) brands. Founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S21, it's based in New York and boasts a lean team of 11.

**Mission:**  
The mission of Confido is to enable AI-powered financial automation that allows CPG brands to scale efficiently and effectively navigate the complexities of financial management.

**Key Features:**
- **Cash Application:** Automates the aggregation and extraction of data from over 40 vendor emails and portals, significantly improving accuracy in payment applications.
- **Deduction Management:** Provides tools to contest invalid claims and track trends across multiple distributors, helping brands recover lost revenue.
- **Trade Promotion Management:** Simplifies the management of promotional events and trade spend analysis, enabling companies to create promotional plans with ease.
- **Sales Forecasting:** Integrates sales and consumption forecasting to enhance overall accuracy in planning and strategy.

**Targeted Audience:**  
Confido caters to various stakeholders within CPG organizations, including:
- CFOs, who gain visibility to make informed decisions.
- Controllers and accountants, who benefit from enhanced efficiency in managing accounting processes.
- Sales and operations teams, who can easily track performance against promotional plans.

**Partnerships and Impact:**  
Confido is already trusted by numerous leading CPG companies, effectively demonstrating that its platform not only saves time but also boosts efficiency in core financial operations. Clients have reported a drastic reduction in manual work hours and improved clarity in their financial processes.

**Team and Leadership:**  
Under the guidance of Group Partner Michael Seibel from Y Combinator, the team at Confido is not just innovating but is adamant about customer feedback, continually enhancing the platform.

In a world where financial efficiency is key to growth, Confido stands out as a beacon for CPG brands looking to streamline their financial management while leveraging the power of AI. If you're in the CPG space and tired of inefficient financial processes, it might be time to book a demo with Confido and see what they can do for you.

Explore more at [Confido's website](https://www.confidotech.com).
